24 int indexOfDof(Robot *r,const std::string &dof_name){
25  for(unsigned int j=0;j<=r->getNumberOfJoints();j++){
26  Joint *joint=r->getJoint(j);
27  if(joint->getName().find(dof_name) == 0){
28  if(joint->getNumberOfDof() == 1){
29  return joint->getIndexOfFirstDof();
30  }else{
31  //several dofs, have to read the dof index in the name
32  std::string subname = dof_name.substr(dof_name.find_first_of("0123456789"), joint->getName().size());
33  int index;
34  if ( ! (std::istringstream(subname) >> index) ){
35  return -1;
36  }
37  return joint->getIndexOfFirstDof() + index;
38  }
39  }
40  }
41  return -1;
42 }
43 Eigen::Affine3d pose2affine(const geometry_msgs::Pose &pose){
44  Eigen::Affine3d aff;
45  Eigen::Vector3d tr(pose.position.x,pose.position.y,pose.position.z);
46  Eigen::Quaterniond q(pose.orientation.w,pose.orientation.x,pose.orientation.y,pose.orientation.z);
47  aff=Eigen::Translation3d(pose.position.x,pose.position.y,pose.position.z);
48  //aff.rotate(q);
49  aff*=q;
50  for(uint i=0;i<3;i++){
51  ROS_DEBUG("%f %f",aff.translation()[i],tr[i]);
52  }
53  return aff;
54 }

76 bool SceneManager::addModule(const std::string &name)
77 {
78  if(_project){
79  ROS_WARN("Cannot add module %s: project already initialized",name.c_str());
80  return false;
81  }else{
82  _modules_to_activ.insert(name);
83  }
84  return true;
85 }

87 bool SceneManager::createScene()
88 {
89  bool ok(1);
90  if(_p3dPath.size()==0){
91  ok=false;
92  ROS_ERROR("no p3d file is given.");
93  _project=NULL;
94  }
95  if(ok){
96  p3d_col_set_mode(p3d_col_mode_none);
97  p3d_read_desc(_p3dPath.c_str());
98  p3d_col_set_mode(p3d_col_mode_pqp);
99  p3d_col_start(p3d_col_mode_pqp);
100  if(_scePath.size()){
101  ROS_INFO("loading sce file %s",_scePath.c_str());
102  p3d_read_scenario(_scePath.c_str());
103  }
104  global_Project = new Project(new Scene(XYZ_ENV));
105  foreach(const std::string &n,_modules_to_activ){
106  global_Project->addModule(n);
107  }
108  ok=global_Project->init();
109  for(uint i=0;i<global_Project->getActiveScene()->getNumberOfRobots();i++){
110  Robot *r=global_Project->getActiveScene()->getRobot(i);
111  r->setAndUpdate(*r->getInitialPosition());
112  }
113  }
114  if(ok){
115  _project=global_Project;
116  }else{
117  ROS_ERROR("error on creating the move3d project");
118  _project=NULL;
119  }
120 
121  _humanMgr = new HumanMgr(_nh,this);
122  return ok;
123 }
124 
125 bool SceneManager::updateRobotPose(const std::string &name, const geometry_msgs::Pose &base_pose)
126 {
127  if(!_project){
128  ROS_ERROR("the project is not initialized, cannot update robot position");
129  return false;
130  }
131  bool ok(1);
132  Robot *r=_project->getActiveScene()->getRobotByName(name);
133  if(!r){
134  ROS_ERROR("no robot named %s in the scene",name.c_str());
135  ok=false;
136  }
137  if(ok){
138  m3dGeometry::setBasePosition(r,Eigen::Vector3d(base_pose.position.x,base_pose.position.y,base_pose.position.z));
139  Eigen::Matrix3d mat = Eigen::Quaterniond(base_pose.orientation.w,
140  base_pose.orientation.x,
141  base_pose.orientation.y,
142  base_pose.orientation.z).matrix();
143  m3dGeometry::setBaseOrientation(r,mat);
144  }
145 
146  return ok;
147 }
148 
149 bool SceneManager::updateRobot(const std::string &name, const geometry_msgs::Pose &base_pose, const std::vector<double> &dof_values)
150 {
151  bool ok(true);
152  std::vector<double> m3d_dofs;
153 
154  ok = convertConfRosToM3d(name,dof_values,m3d_dofs);
155  if(!ok && updateAcceptBaseOnly()){
156  ROS_WARN_ONCE("Updating %s: no or wrong configuration given, updating only base pose.",name.c_str());
157  ROS_DEBUG("Updating %s: no or wrong configuration given, updating only base pose.",name.c_str());
158  return updateRobotPose(name,base_pose);
159  }
160  if(!ok){
161  return false;
162  }
163 
164  m3d_dofs[0+6]=base_pose.position.x;
165  m3d_dofs[1+6]=base_pose.position.y;
166  m3d_dofs[2+6]=base_pose.position.z;
167 
168  //tf::Quaternion rot(pose.orientation.x,pose.orientation.y,pose.orientation.z,pose.orientation.w); // w last in tf
169  Eigen::Quaterniond rot(base_pose.orientation.w,base_pose.orientation.x,base_pose.orientation.y,base_pose.orientation.z); //w first in Eigen
170  Eigen::Matrix3d mat= rot.matrix();
171  Eigen::Vector3d euler =mat.eulerAngles(0,1,2);
172  for(unsigned int i=0;i<3;++i){
173  m3d_dofs[3+6+i]=euler[i];
174  }
175  return updateRobotM3d(name,m3d_dofs);
176 
177 }
178 
179 bool SceneManager::updateRobotM3d(const std::string &name, std::vector<double> &dof_values)
180 {
181  if(!_project){
182  ROS_ERROR("the project is not initialized, cannot update robot position");
183  return false;
184  }
185  bool ok(1);
186  Robot *r=_project->getActiveScene()->getRobotByName(name);
187  if(!r){
188  ROS_ERROR("no robot named %s in the scene",name.c_str());
189  ok=false;
190  }
191  if(ok){
192  RobotState q(r,1);
193  for(uint i=6;i<dof_values.size();++i){
194  q[i]=dof_values[i];
195  }
196  r->setAndUpdate(q);
197  //if(q.getNbDof() == dof_values.size()){
198  // q.setConfiguration(&dof_values[0]);
199  // r->setAndUpdate(q);
200  //}else{
201  // ok=false;
202  // ROS_ERROR("wrong number of joints for robot %s. Given %lu, move3d says it has %u",name.c_str(),dof_values.size(),q.getNbDof());
203  //}
204  }
205  return ok;
206 }

208 bool SceneManager::updateObject(const std::string &name, const geometry_msgs::Pose &pose)

213 bool SceneManager::updateHuman(const std::string &name, const geometry_msgs::Pose &base_pose, const std::map<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose> &joints)
214 {
215 
216  Eigen::Affine3d base;
217  std::map<std::string,Eigen::Affine3d> joints_tf;
218  base = pose2affine(base_pose);
219  typedef std::pair<std::string, geometry_msgs::Pose> Iterator;
220  foreach(Iterator it,joints){
221  joints_tf[it.first] = pose2affine(it.second);
222  }
223  return _humanMgr->setHumanPos(name,base,joints_tf);
224 }
225 
226 bool SceneManager::setDofNameOrdered(const std::string &robot_name, const std::vector<std::string> &dof_names)
227 {
228  JointCorrespName_t::const_iterator corresp_names_it = _jointCorrespNames.find(robot_name);
229  bool ok(1);
230  if(corresp_names_it == _jointCorrespNames.end()){
231  ROS_ERROR("no joint correspondances set for robot %s.",robot_name.c_str());
232  ok=false;
233  }
234  if(ok && !_project){
235  ok=false;
236  ROS_ERROR("the project is not initialized, cannot set robot dof correspondance");
237  }
238  if(ok && !(_project->getActiveScene() && _project->getActiveScene()->getRobotByName(robot_name))){
239  ok=false;
240  ROS_ERROR("no robot named %s in the scene",robot_name.c_str());
241  }
242 
243  if(ok){
244  Robot *r = _project->getActiveScene()->getRobotByName(robot_name);
245  const NameMap_t &corresp_names = corresp_names_it->second;
246  if(dof_names.size() == 0)
247  ROS_WARN("setDofNameOrdered: dof_names is empty, will not be abble to set joint name correspondance");
248  for(unsigned int i=0;i<dof_names.size();++i){
249  const std::string &dof_name = dof_names[i];
250  NameMap_t::const_iterator name_pair_it = corresp_names.find(dof_name);
251  if(name_pair_it != corresp_names.end()){
252  //the Dof has a correspondance, find the corresponding index in move3d
253  int index = indexOfDof(r,name_pair_it->second);
254  if(index>=0){
255  _jointCorrespIndex[robot_name][i]=index;
256  }else{
257  ROS_ERROR("DoF named %s not found for robot %s in move3d (corresponding to dof %s in ROS)",name_pair_it->second.c_str(),robot_name.c_str(),dof_name.c_str());
258  ok=false;
259  break;
260  }
261  }
262  }
263  }
264  return ok;
265 }
266 
267 bool SceneManager::fetchDofCorrespParam(const std::string &param_name, const std::string &robot_name)
268 {
269  NameMap_t &name_map = _jointCorrespNames[robot_name];
270  //XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue value;
271  ros::param::get(param_name,name_map);
272  //for(XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator it = value.begin(); it!=value.end();++it){
273  // std::string key = it->first;
274  // XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue name = it->second;
275  // name_map[key]=name
276 
277  //}
278  typedef std::pair<std::string,std::string> namePair_t;
279  foreach(namePair_t v,name_map){
280  ROS_INFO("%s %s",v.first.c_str(),v.second.c_str());
281  }
282  return true;
283 }
284 
285 bool SceneManager::fetchDofCorrespParam(const std::string &base_param_name)
286 {
287  if(!_project){
288  ROS_DEBUG("project not set. Cannot fetch DoF Correspondances for all robots");
289  return false;
290  }
291  for(unsigned int i=0;i<project()->getActiveScene()->getNumberOfRobots();++i){
292  Robot *r=project()->getActiveScene()->getRobot(i);
293  if(r->isAgent() && r->getHriAgent()){
294  std::string type=Sem::AgentType::agentTypeToString(r->getHriAgent()->type);
295  if(!fetchDofCorrespParam(base_param_name+"/"+type,r->getName()) && !fetchDofCorrespParam(base_param_name+"/"+r->getName(),r->getName())){
296  ROS_WARN("no parameter %s/%s found for DoF correspondances for robot %s (nor %s/%s)",base_param_name.c_str(),r->getName().c_str(),r->getName().c_str(),base_param_name.c_str(),type.c_str());
297  }
298  }else if(r->isAgent()){
299  if(!fetchDofCorrespParam(base_param_name+"/"+r->getName(),r->getName())){
300  ROS_WARN("no parameter %s/%s found for DoF correspondances for robot %s",base_param_name.c_str(),r->getName().c_str(),r->getName().c_str());
301  }
302 
303  }
304  }
305  return true;
306 }
307 
308 bool SceneManager::convertConfRosToM3d(const std::string &robot_name, const std::vector<double> &ros_conf, std::vector<double> &m3d_conf)
309 {
310  bool ok(true);
311  m3d_conf.clear();
312  if(_jointCorrespIndex.find(robot_name) == _jointCorrespIndex.end()){
313  ROS_DEBUG("no joint indices configured for robot %s (yet)",robot_name.c_str());
314  return false;
315  }
316  const UintMap_t &index_map = _jointCorrespIndex[robot_name];
317  m3d_conf.assign(index_map.size(),0.);
318  uint count(0);
319  for(uint i=0;i<ros_conf.size();++i){
320  UintMap_t::const_iterator it = index_map.find(i);
321  if(it!=index_map.end()){
322  ++count;
323  if(m3d_conf.size()<=it->second){
324  m3d_conf.resize(it->second+1);
325  }
326  m3d_conf.at(it->second) = ros_conf[i];
327  }
328  }
329  if (count!=index_map.size()){
330  ROS_ERROR("Some joints are missing in the given ros conf. I couldn't fill the m3d conf (%u set vs. %lu expected)",count,index_map.size());
331  ok=false;
332  }
333  return ok;
334 }

398 bool SceneManager::saveScenario(const std::string &path)
399 {
400  for(unsigned int i=0;i<_project->getActiveScene()->getNumberOfRobots();++i){
401  Robot *r=_project->getActiveScene()->getRobot(i);
402  p3d_copy_config_into(r->getRobotStruct(),r->getCurrentPos()->getConfigStruct(),&(r->getRobotStruct()->ROBOT_POS) );
403  }
404  ROS_INFO("Saving scenario in %s",path.c_str());
405  p3d_rw_scenario_init_name();
406  bool ok = p3d_save_scenario(path.c_str());
407  if(!ok)
408  ROS_ERROR("failed to save scenario");
409  return ok;
410 }
